---
config:
  look: handDrawn
  theme: neutral
---

%%{
  init: {
    'theme': 'neutral',
    'themeVariables': {
      'primaryColor': '#BB2528',
      'primaryTextColor': '#fff',
      'primaryBorderColor': '#7C0000',
      'lineColor': '#F8B229',
      'secondaryColor': '#006100',
      'tertiaryColor': '#fff',
      'fontSize': '28px'
    }
  }
}%%
flowchart TD
    %% Agents
    A1([Content Generator]):::agent
    A2([Evaluator]):::agent
    A3([Regenerator]):::agent

    %% Tasks
    T1[Generate Proposal Section]:::task
    T2[Evaluate Proposal Section]:::task
    T3[Regenerate Section Based on Feedback]:::task

    %% Relationships
    A1 --> T1
    T1 --> T2
    A2 --> T2
    T2 --> T3
    A3 --> T3
    T3 --> T2

    %% Styling
    classDef agent fill:#B3D4FC,stroke:#1D4ED8,stroke-width:2px;
    classDef task fill:#D1FAE5,stroke:#059669,stroke-width:2px;
repo_description: An extensible agentic AI system to build project proposal
